ns0:Concept.displayName: Platelets [#/volume] in Plasma by Automated count
Platelets [#/volume] in Blood by Automated count
Platelets [#/volume] in Blood by Manual count

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains lab tests commonly used for a blood/serum/plasma platelet count test.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood/serum/plasma for platelets. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to Laboratory Test, Result or Laboratory Test, Order datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Platelet count lab test using the source of blood/serum/plasma with a reporting scale of number/volume.),(Exclusion Criteria: Platelet count lab test using the source of capillary blood.)
